thread.title: Jim Jeffries

author: Jim Jeffries
title: Jim Jeffries
text:
I have ordered 2 headstones from Legacy and the quality of both of them is beyond compare. The workmanship it spot on attention to every detail.
The ordering process was very smooth and fast delivered fast and secure. I priced out other options, local and on-line and their prices are very fair, for
what I received it is by far the best company out there. I thank them and their exceptional work!
